Name: Meowlux Wish Coin (Bound)
Description: Using a Wish coin allows for one Wish draw, and the drawn prize is guaranteed to be in bound status. Rewards include limited edition mounts, clothing, accessories, design blueprints, dye materials, and there is also a chance to receive Meowlux Chamber's premium cards and privilege cards.
Description$english: Using a Wish coin allows for one Wish draw, and the drawn prize is guaranteed to be in bound status. Rewards include limited edition mounts, clothing, accessories, design blueprints, dye materials, and there is also a chance to receive Meowlux Chamber's premium cards and privilege cards.
Description2$english: It is worth mentioning that the Meowlux Premium Card itself is a valuable item, allowing you to purchase seasonal outfits, jewelry, and specially customized hairstyles designed by the Guild's studios.
